faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Moving and Transport
faqs.subtitle: We answer your questions about moving services, transport and logistics in Marbella and Costa del Sol

faq1.question: How much does a move cost?
faq1.answer: The price of a move varies depending on several factors: type of property (apartment, house, office), distance, volume of items, additional services (packing, assembly) and urgency. Use our online calculator to get a free approximate quote with no obligation, or request a detailed personalized quote.

faq2.question: How do I calculate the price of a move?
faq2.answer: You can calculate the price of your move using our online calculator on the main page. You just need to indicate the route (origin and destination), type of property, special items (pianos, works of art) and additional services. You can also request a free personalized quote with no obligation to get an exact price.

faq3.question: What does professional moving service include?
faq3.answer: Our complete professional moving service includes: professional packing with all materials, loading and unloading, safe transport with appropriate vehicles, furniture assembly at destination, complete insurance for your belongings and real-time tracking. We also offer partial services according to your needs.

faq4.question: How do I hire a moving company?
faq4.answer: To hire a move with PortesPro, you can use our online calculator to get an approximate quote, request a free personalized quote, or contact us directly by phone or WhatsApp. Once the quote is agreed, we plan the move date and our professionals take care of the entire process.

faq5.question: Do you include packing in the move price?
faq5.answer: Yes, in our complete moving packages we include professional packing at no additional cost. Our team comes to your home with all necessary materials (boxes, bubble wrap, film, blankets) and performs complete packing of your items. You can also hire only the packing service if you do the move yourself.

faq6.question: How long does a move take?
faq6.answer: The time of a move depends on the volume of items, distance and complexity. A local move (Marbella, Málaga, Costa del Sol) can take 4 to 8 hours for a standard home. Interprovincial or national moves can take 1 to 3 days. We provide an estimated schedule when we plan your move.

faq7.question: Do you offer urgent moves?
faq7.answer: Yes, we offer urgent moves and 24-hour express moves for situations that require immediate relocation. Our team is available 24/7 for urgent moves in Marbella and Costa del Sol. Contact us for an urgent quote and we will help you as soon as possible.

faq8.question: What guarantees do the moves have?
faq8.answer: All our moves include complete insurance to protect your belongings during transport. In addition, we offer satisfaction guarantee and civil liability. Our team consists of certified professionals with years of experience. If any damage occurs, our insurance policy covers the transported items according to our conditions.

faq9.question: How much does a small move cost?
faq9.answer: The price of a small move varies according to distance and volume. For cheap small moves in Marbella and Costa del Sol, prices start from 200€ for studios or small apartments. Use our online calculator to get the approximate small move price or request a free personalized quote.

faq10.question: How does the freight and moving service work?
faq10.answer: Our freight and moving service offers cheap transport and cheap freight for individuals and businesses. We work with trucks for moves of different sizes according to your needs. Economical freight includes loose furniture transport, furniture transfer and complete moving transport service. Contact us to quote your freight or cheap transport.

faq11.question: Do you offer national and international moves?
faq11.answer: Yes, we offer both national and international moves. For national moves, we work throughout Spain with competitive prices. In international moves, we handle the necessary documentation and coordinate furniture transfer to any country. Request a quote for national move prices or international move prices according to your destination.

faq12.question: What is the moving price per hour?
faq12.answer: The moving price per hour depends on the type of service. For small local moves, the moving price per hour can be between 25€ and 40€ per hour. For business moves or office moves, the price may vary. The approximate moving price depends on volume and distance. Our online calculator will give you an approximate moving price, or you can request a detailed quote with exact moving price per hour.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Storage
faqs.subtitle: We answer your questions about storage in Marbella, Málaga and Costa del Sol

faq1.question: How much does it cost to rent a storage unit?
faq1.answer: The price to rent storage varies according to size. Mini storage from 35€/month, small storage from 45€/month, medium storage from 85€/month. We offer cheap storage and affordable storage with different payment options. The monthly price includes space rental.

faq2.question: What is the price per square meter?
faq2.answer: The price per square meter varies according to total size. For small storage (1-4m²) the price is approximately 10-12€/m²/month. For medium storage (5-10m²) the price is approximately 8-10€/m²/month. For large storage (15m²+) the price is approximately 6-8€/m²/month.

faq3.question: Do you offer home storage service?
faq3.answer: Yes, we offer home storage service. We collect your furniture and belongings at your home, you don't need to transport them. Our team comes to your home with the appropriate vehicle and performs complete pickup. Home storage included in the service.

faq4.question: Can I verify my belongings online?
faq4.answer: Yes, with our online storage service you can access your account with username and password to always verify what you have stored. The online storage platform allows you to check your inventory from any device, 24 hours a day.

faq5.question: How does the online storage platform work?
faq5.answer: Our online storage platform allows you to access with username and password to manage your storage. You can verify your inventory, check your belongings, see your storage status and manage your account. 24/7 online access from any device.

faq6.question: What is a mini warehouse or mini storage?
faq6.answer: A mini warehouse or mini storage is a small storage space, ideal for personal items, small boxes or belongings that don't take up much space. Our mini warehouses range from 1-2m² and are perfect for compact and affordable storage.

faq7.question: Do you offer business storage?
faq7.answer: Yes, we offer business storage and commercial storage. Our business storage includes flexible access, modular spaces and online management. Perfect for businesses that need temporary or permanent storage of files, office supplies or products.

faq8.question: Can I rent storage by the day?
faq8.answer: Yes, we offer daily storage for short-term temporary storage. Perfect if you need temporary storage for a few days or weeks. Daily storage has flexible rates and you can rent it for as long as you need.

faq9.question: What's the difference between personal and business storage?
faq9.answer: Personal storage is designed for domestic and personal use, while business storage offers additional features such as flexible access, advanced online management and modular spaces. Both types include the same security and climate control guarantees.

faq10.question: Are storage units modular or prefabricated?
faq10.answer: We offer modular storage units that adapt to your changing needs. Modular storage allows you to expand or reduce space as needed, while we also have prefabricated storage options for specific needs.

faq11.question: Do you offer self storage?
faq11.answer: Yes, we offer self storage with independent access and personal management. Self storage allows you to access your space when you need it, with your own key and total control over your storage.

faq12.question: I need storage, how can I rent it?
faq12.answer: If you need storage, you can easily rent it. Use our online calculator to get a quote, or contact us for a personalized consultation. We offer storage to rent from 35€/month with different sizes available.

faq13.question: What are the storage rates?
faq13.answer: Storage rates vary according to size and duration. Mini storage from 35€/month, small storage from 60€/month, medium storage from 85€/month, large storage from 120€/month. We offer discounts for long-term contracts. Storage rates are competitive and transparent.

faq14.question: Does the service include home pickup?
faq14.answer: Yes, our storage service includes home pickup. You don't need to transport your furniture, our team comes to your home with the appropriate vehicle and performs complete pickup. Home storage service included at no additional cost.

faq15.question: Can I access my storage online 24 hours?
faq15.answer: Yes, with our online storage service you can access your account 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. With username and password you can verify your inventory, check your belongings and manage your storage from any device with internet connection.

faq16.question: Are storage units climate-controlled?
faq16.answer: Yes, all our storage units are climate-controlled with air conditioning and temperature control to protect your belongings from heat and humidity. Temperature-controlled storage is ideal for sensitive items such as fine wood furniture, artwork or important documents.

faq17.question: What security do storage units have?
faq17.answer: Our secure storage units include 24-hour surveillance, alarms, security cameras and controlled access. Monitored storage and secure storage guarantee maximum protection of your belongings. We also offer optional content insurance for greater peace of mind.

faq18.question: Can I access my storage 24 hours?
faq18.answer: Yes, we offer 24-hour storage with easy access according to the chosen plan. Storage access is available at different times according to your needs. Some plans include unlimited access, while others have specific hours.

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions about Packing
faqs.subtitle: We answer your questions about our professional packing service for moves

faq1.question: What does the professional packing service include?
faq1.answer: Our professional packing service includes our experts coming to your home with all necessary materials (cardboard boxes, bubble wrap, plastic film, protection blankets) and performing complete packing of your items. You don't need to buy anything, we bring the materials and do the work.

faq2.question: How much does the packing service for moves cost?
faq2.answer: The price of the professional packing service for moves varies according to the type of home and number of items. We offer complete packing included in complete moves at no additional cost, or partial packing only for fragile items. Request a personalized quote without commitment.

faq3.question: Is packing included in the moving price?
faq3.answer: Yes, we offer packing included at no additional cost in our complete move packages. Our professional team comes to your home with all materials and performs complete packing. You can also hire complete professional packing or partial packing only for fragile items.

faq4.question: Do you pack large furniture?
faq4.answer: Yes, we offer professional packing service for large and small furniture. We use special protection blankets, stretch film and customized covers to protect your furniture during move transport.

faq5.question: Do you offer appliance packing?
faq5.answer: Yes, we perform professional packing of appliances such as refrigerators, freezers, washing machines, dryers, televisions and others. We use specific materials and specialized techniques for each type of appliance.

faq6.question: How do you pack fragile items like glass and porcelain?
faq6.answer: Our professional packing service for fragile items includes specific multi-layer protection: bubble wrap or bubble plastic, cardboard separators and corner protectors. Our experts know the proper techniques to protect glass, porcelain, tableware and artwork during transport.

faq7.question: Do they have to come to my house to do the packing?
faq7.answer: Yes, our professional packing service is performed at your home. Our team comes with all necessary materials (boxes, bubble wrap, film, blankets) and performs complete packing on site. You don't need to buy or prepare anything, we take care of everything.

faq8.question: What type of packing do you do for appliances?
faq8.answer: For appliances like refrigerators, freezers and washing machines, our professional packing service includes special protection covers, stretch film and furniture blankets. We protect each appliance with specific materials to prevent damage during transport.

faq9.question: Can I hire only the packing service without moving?
faq9.answer: Yes, you can hire our professional packing service independently. Our team comes to your home with all materials and performs complete packing. Ideal if you need to pack for a move you will do yourself or for storage.

faq10.question: Do you offer home packing service in Marbella?
faq10.answer: Yes, we offer professional packing service at home in Marbella, Costa del Sol, Malaga and throughout the province. Our team comes to your home with all packing materials included and performs the work on site.

faq11.question: What packing materials do you use?
faq11.answer: We use first-quality professional packing materials: resistant cardboard boxes, bubble wrap, stretch film, protection blankets, high-strength adhesive tape and special covers. All materials are included in the service at no additional cost.

faq12.question: How long does the packing service take?
faq12.answer: Professional packing time depends on the size of the home and number of items. For a studio it can be 2-3 hours, for a medium apartment 4-6 hours, and for a large house it may require a full day. We give you an accurate estimate in the quote.

faq1.question: What temperatures do you handle for cold transport?
faq1.answer: We handle different temperature ranges according to the product: freezing at -18°C, refrigerated between 2°C and 8°C, and controlled temperature for pharmaceutical products according to regulations.

faq2.question: How much does cold transport cost?
faq2.answer: The price of cold transport varies according to distance, required temperature range and type of product. Request a personalized quote without commitment with our online calculator.

faq3.question: Do you have refrigerated vehicles?
faq3.answer: Yes, we have a fleet of refrigerated vehicles equipped with temperature control systems to guarantee the cold chain at all times.

faq4.question: Can you transport pharmaceutical products?
faq4.answer: Yes, we offer specialized pharmaceutical transport with strict temperature control according to current regulations and complete process tracking.

faq5.question: Do you offer real-time tracking?
faq5.answer: Yes, all our cold transports include real-time tracking so you can know the location and temperature of your shipment at all times.

faq6.question: What do you guarantee for the cold chain?
faq6.answer: We guarantee cold chain maintenance throughout transport with continuous temperature controls, certified refrigerated vehicles and documented process tracking.

faq7.question: Do you offer cold courier service?
faq7.answer: Yes, we offer cold courier service and cold courier for urgent shipments with controlled temperature. Our cold courier service guarantees the cold chain throughout the journey.

faq8.question: Can I ship cold packages?
faq8.answer: Yes, we offer cold package shipping and cold package shipping with guaranteed cold chain. Our cold package shipping service includes controlled temperature and real-time tracking.

faq9.question: Do you offer cold transport for individuals?
faq9.answer: Yes, we offer cold transport for individuals who need to transport cold products. The cold transport price for individuals is competitive and adapted to your needs.

faq10.question: What types of vehicles do you use for cold transport?
faq10.answer: We use isothermal truck with cold, freezing cold truck, cold truck for delivery and containers to maintain cold. Our fleet is equipped with cold systems for trucks and guarantees the cold chain throughout transport.

faq11.question: Are you a certified cold transport company?
faq11.answer: Yes, we are a certified cold transport company specialized in transport with cold chain. As cold transport companies, we comply with all food and pharmaceutical safety regulations. We are transport companies with cold chain and transport companies with controlled temperature.

faq12.question: Do you offer express cold transport?
faq12.answer: Yes, we offer express cold transport for urgent deliveries. Express cold transport guarantees the cold chain with fast delivery and controlled temperature.

faq13.question: What is cold chain transport?
faq13.answer: Cold chain transport is the process of maintaining products at controlled temperature throughout transport. Our cold chain transport service guarantees that products maintain their temperature from origin to destination.

faq14.question: Do you transport cold cargo?
faq14.answer: Yes, we offer transport of cold cargo and cold cargo transport for businesses. Our transport of cold cargo service includes specialized vehicles and guaranteed cold chain.

faq15.question: What does transport with controlled temperature mean?
faq15.answer: Transport with controlled temperature is a service that maintains products at a specific temperature throughout transport. We offer transport with controlled temperature and transport of controlled temperature for different ranges according to the product.

faq16.question: Do you offer temperature controlled shipments?
faq16.answer: Yes, we offer temperature controlled shipments and temperature controlled shipments for any type of product. Our service guarantees the temperature throughout the shipping process.

faq17.question: What cold logistics services do you offer?
faq17.answer: As cold logistics companies, we offer refrigerated transport, cold storage, cold distribution and refrigerated delivery. Our complete cold logistics service includes guaranteed cold chain and controlled temperature.

faq18.question: Do you transport frozen products?
faq18.answer: Yes, we offer transport of cold and frozen products with guaranteed -18°C temperature. Our transport of cold and frozen products service uses freezing cold truck and guarantees the cold chain throughout the process.
